org.jcvi.jillion.sam.header

Class SamHeaderBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jcvi.jillion.sam.header.SamHeaderBuilder

  • public final class SamHeaderBuilder
extends Object
    Builder is the builder class used to construct a SamHeader
    Author:
    dkatzel

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SamHeaderBuilder()
      Create a new Builder instance with the default values of "unknown" sort order and nothing or empty for everything else.
      SamHeaderBuilder(SamHeader copy)

    • Constructor Detail

      • SamHeaderBuilder

        public SamHeaderBuilder()
        Create a new Builder instance with the default values of "unknown" sort order and nothing or empty for everything else. Use the methods on the builder to add/set values for the header.

      • SamHeaderBuilder

        public SamHeaderBuilder(SamHeader copy)

    • Method Detail

      • setVersion

        public SamHeaderBuilder setVersion(SamVersion version)

      • addReferenceSequence

        public SamHeaderBuilder addReferenceSequence(SamReferenceSequence refSeq)
        Add a ReferenceSequence to this header. The order that the references are added defines the alignment sorting order for some SortOrder implementations.
        Parameters:
        refSeq - the ReferenceSequence to add; can not be null.
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if refSeq is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if a ReferenceSequence with the same name has already been added to this builder.

      • addReadGroup

        public SamHeaderBuilder addReadGroup(SamReadGroup readGroup)
        Add a ReadGroup to this header. Each record added must have a unique Id.
        Parameters:
        readGroup - the ReadGroup to add; can not be null.
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if readGroup is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if a ReadGroup with the same id has already been added to this builder.

      • addProgram

        public SamHeaderBuilder addProgram(SamProgram program)
        Add a SamProgram to this header. Each record added must have a unique Id.
        Parameters:
        program - the SamProgram to add; can not be null.
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if program is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if a SamProgram with the same id has already been added to this builder.

      • addComment

        public SamHeaderBuilder addComment(String commentLine)
        Add a comment line to the list of comments.
        Parameters:
        commentLine - the comment line to add; can not be null.
        Returns:
        this.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if commentLine is null.

      • setSortOrder

        public SamHeaderBuilder setSortOrder(SortOrder order)
        Set the SortOrder.
        Parameters:
        order - the SortOrder; if this value is set to null then the value will be changed to SortOrder.UNKNOWN.
        Returns:
        this.

      • build

        public SamHeader build()
        Build a new SamHeader.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if a SamProgram's previous program id is not also included in this header.

      • hasReferenceSequence

        public boolean hasReferenceSequence(String name)

        public SortOrder getSortOrder()
